casebody.data:
Christie DERUITER, Plaintiff/Counterdefendant-Appellee,
v.
TOWNSHIP OF BYRON, Defendant/Counterplaintiff-Appellant. SC: 158311
COA: 338972 Supreme Court of Michigan. April 17, 2019

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of the Cannabis Attorneys of Michigan to file a brief amicus curiae is GRANTED. The amicus brief submitted on April 16, 2019, is accepted for filing.
